attributes.action: Government to still fund GCSEs for Home educated children
attributes.additional_details: Unfortunately the School setting is not suitable for every child . And those not suited for school life actually do better in the home environment . Most home educated children are actually ready to take their GCSEs a lot earlier than they would if at school .All we ask is that the government please fund these childrens GCSEs . Every child should still receive their GCSEs for free no matter where they are educated .
attributes.background: At present government states  that as soon as you withdraw your child from main stream school you the parent are responsible for funding all educational needs . We ask that the government still provide all children no matter where they are educated with their GCSEs

rejection.details:
Fund free access for all home educated children to GCSE examinations
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/743064
